attributes.action: Replace Rule Britannia proms finale with Party Rock / Time mashup.
attributes.additional_details: Rule Britannia is outdated, out of touch and is now largely used and sang by Nationalistic Gammon.  It does not portray the current underlying melancholic despair felt by the general British public (and wider global community) who are clinging to their last shred of hope that Party Rock/Time's nostalgic, epic masterpiece conveys.
attributes.background: Replace Rule Britannia with the mash up of Hans Zimmer's Time and LMFAO's Party Rock (https://youtu.be/gyjz3lekieQ) for the end of the proms finale.

rejection.details:
Decisions about the BBC Proms are a matter for BBC, which is operationally independent, not the Government or House of Commons.

You can read the BBC's announcement of the programme for the Last Night of the Proms here: https://www.pressparty.com/pg/newsdesk/BBC1/view/223541/
